title: Blended Learning Design Reflecting Student Preferences in Online Life Sciences Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of life science concepts and applied mathematics skills at the secondary level
context.additional_context: Application of a blended learning model based on life science learning preferences in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Explain three or more types of preferences for online life sciences learning activities
Complete 80% or more of formative assessments based on LMS in blended learning environments
Accurately apply 70% or more of core life sciences concepts using smartphone-optimized learning materials

resources: Life Science Foundational Concept Video (5 minutes or less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
